definitions.description: Protection provided by the Insurer and the level of indemnification provided under an Insurance Policy, example include liability, earthquake, or collision.

constantValues: Protection provided by the Insurer and the level of indemnification provided under an Insurance Policy, example include liability, earthquake, or collision.

members.name: coverageId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: statecode
members.description: Status of the Coverage

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statecode_display' is added to the 'Coverage' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statecode'
supportingAttribute.name: statecode_display

members.name: statuscode
members.description: Reason for the status of the Coverage

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statuscode_display' is added to the 'Coverage' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statuscode'
supportingAttribute.name: statuscode_display

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Coverage

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: name
members.description: Required name field.

members.name: baserate
members.description: Base rate for a single exposure before any RMF.

constantValues: Base rate for a single exposure before any RMF.

members.name: commisionrate
members.description: Identifies the Coverage type, for example collision, liability, property protection, life.

constantValues: Identifies the Coverage type, for example collision, liability, property protection, life.

members.name: coveragelob
members.description: Reference to Coverage in Line of business.

constantValues: Reference to Coverage in Line of business.

members.name: coveragetype
members.description: Identifies the Coverage type, for example collision, liability, property protection, life.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'coveragetype_display' is added to the 'Coverage' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'coveragetype'
supportingAttribute.name: coveragetype_display

constantValues: Identifies the Coverage type, for example collision, liability, property protection, life.

members.name: deductibleamount
members.description: Amount of deductible on the Coverage that the customer pay before the insurance provider covers the costs of the Claim.

constantValues: Amount of deductible on the Coverage that the customer pay before the insurance provider covers the costs of the Claim.

members.name: deductibleamount_Base
members.description: Value of the deductible amount in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the deductible amount in base currency.

members.name: deductiblecode
members.description: A code corresponding to the deductible amount.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'deductiblecode_display' is added to the 'Coverage' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'deductiblecode'
supportingAttribute.name: deductiblecode_display

constantValues: A code corresponding to the deductible amount.

members.name: description
members.description: Description of the linked benefit or Coverage provided as part of the Policy.

constantValues: Description of the linked benefit or Coverage provided as part of the Policy.

members.name: discountamount
members.description: The discount given on the Coverage.

constantValues: The discount given on the Coverage.

members.name: discountamount_Base
members.description: Value of the discount amount in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the discount amount in base currency.

members.name: discountpercent
members.description: The discount percent given on the Coverage.

constantValues: The discount percent given on the Coverage.

members.name: limitamount
members.description: The maximum monetary limit for the Coverage.

constantValues: The maximum monetary limit for the Coverage.

members.name: limitamount_Base
members.description: Value of the limit amount in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the limit amount in base currency.

members.name: limitamountaggregate
members.description: Maximum amount of insurance for the Coverage for all Claims occurrences in a Policy term.

constantValues: Maximum amount of insurance for the Coverage for all Claims occurrences in a Policy term.

members.name: limitamountaggregate_Base
members.description: Value of the Limit amount aggregate in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the Limit amount aggregate in base currency.

members.name: limitcode
members.description: A code corresponding to the limit amount.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'limitcode_display' is added to the 'Coverage' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'limitcode'
supportingAttribute.name: limitcode_display

constantValues: A code corresponding to the limit amount.

members.name: limiteachoccurrence
members.description: The maximum monetary limit of the Coverage per occurrence.

constantValues: The maximum monetary limit of the Coverage per occurrence.

members.name: limiteachoccurrence_Base
members.description: Value of the limit each occurrence in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the limit each occurrence in base currency.

members.name: limiteachperson
members.description: The maximum monetary limit of the Coverage per person.

constantValues: The maximum monetary limit of the Coverage per person.

members.name: limiteachperson_Base
members.description: Value of the limit each person in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the limit each person in base currency.

members.name: lob
members.description: a reference to the Line of business of Coverage.

constantValues: a reference to the Line of business of Coverage.

members.name: policy
members.description: Reference to the Insurance Policy that includes the Coverage.

constantValues: Reference to the Insurance Policy that includes the Coverage.

members.name: premiumadjustmentfactor
members.description: Rate modification factor apply to the base rate to allow for better pricing the risk -depicting, expenses, risk, etc.

constantValues: Rate modification factor apply to the base rate to allow for better pricing the risk -depicting, expenses, risk, etc.

members.name: premiumamount
members.description: The premium paid by the customer for this specific Coverage for the Policy period.

constantValues: The premium paid by the customer for this specific Coverage for the Policy period.

members.name: premiumamount_Base
members.description: Value of the premium amount in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the premium amount in base currency.

members.name: rate
members.description: Final rate (after rate modifications) for a single unit of exposure.

constantValues: Final rate (after rate modifications) for a single unit of exposure.

members.name: validfrom
members.description: Date the Coverage is active.

members.name: validto
members.description: Date the Coverage expires.
